definitions.definition: Not similar or congruent ; not matching or fitting in.
Of two numbers, with respect to a third, such that their difference can not be divided by it without a remainder .
examples: 20 and 25 are incongruous with respect to 4.

main_definition: Not similar or congruent ; not matching or fitting in.
secondary_definitions: ( mathematics ) Of two numbers, with respect to a third, such that their difference can not be divided by it without a remainder .
